<template>
<form>
  <label >Email:</label>
  <input type="email" required >
  </form>
</template>

<script>
export default {
    data(){
        
    }
}
</script>

<style>

form{
    max-width: 420px;
    margin: 30px auto;
    background: white;
    text-align: left;
    padding: 40px;
    border-radius: 10px;
}

label {
    color: #aaa;
    display: inline-block;
    margin: 25px 0 15px;
    font-size: 0.6em;
    text-transform: uppercase;
    letter-spacing: 1px;
    font-weight: bold;
}

input{
    display: block;
    padding: 10px 6px;
    width: 100%;
    box-sizing: border-box;
    border: none;
    border-bottom: 1px solid #ddd;
    color: #555;
}

</style>
